body.raw:
{
    "photos": [
        "photo1.jpg",
        "photo2.jpg"
    ],
    "location": "123 Main Street, City",
    "businessNature": "INDIVIDUAL",
    "currency": "USD",
    "individualNbr": "12345",
    "individualTaxIdNbr": "67890",
    "businessRegistrationNbr": "R12345",
    "businessTaxIdNbr": "T67890",
    "price": 100.00,
    "isPaid": true,
    "listingPaidType": "FEATURED",
    "noOfPromotionDays": 2,
    "eventType": "ONLINE",
    "onlineEvent": {
        "category": "Webinar",
        "name": "Sample Online Event",
        "highlight": "highlight",
        "imageUrl": "webinar_image.jpg",
        "dateType": "MULTIPLE",
        "dateRanges": [
            {
                "date": "2024-02-01",
                "startTime": "07:00",
                "endTime": "10:00"
            },
            {
                "date": "2024-02-02",
                "startTime": "13:00",
                "endTime": "16:00"
            },
            {
                "date": "2024-02-03",
                "startTime": "16:00",
                "endTime": "19:00"
            }
        ],
        "maxAttendances": 100,
        "language": "English",
        "price": 25.50,
        "status": "PENDING",
        "requirements": [
            "Computer",
            "Internet Connection"
        ],
        "otherInformation": "Join our informative online event.",
        "guestInformation": "Guests are welcome.",
        "hostInformation": "Hosted by Jane Smith",
        "cancellationPolicy": "Full refund if canceled 48 hours before the event.",
        "hostSkillLevel": "BEGINNER",
        "nbrOfDays": 1,
        "hoursPerDay": 2,
        "isDiscountAvailable": true,
        "discount": 15.0,
        "business": [
            "Technology",
            "Education"
        ],
        "experiential": [
            "Interactive"
        ],
        "healthAndWellness": "No health-related content",
        "specialInterest": "Digital Marketing",
        "platform": "Zoom",
        "link": "https://zoom.us/join?event_id=12345"
    }
}

{
    "photos": [
        "photo1.jpg",
        "photo2.jpg"
    ],
    "location": "123 Main Street, City",
    "businessNature": "INDIVIDUAL",
    "currency": "USD",
    "individualNbr": "12345",
    "individualTaxIdNbr": "67890",
    "businessRegistrationNbr": "R12345",
    "businessTaxIdNbr": "T67890",
    "price": 100,
    "isPaid": true,
    "listingPaidType": "PROMOTED",
    "noOfPromotionDays": 2,
    "eventType": "ONSITE",
    "onsiteEvent": {
        "category": "Workshop",
        "name": "Sample Onsite Event",
        "highlight": "highlight",
        "imageUrl": "event_image.jpg",
        "dateType": "MULTIPLE",
        "dateRanges": [
            {
                "date": "2024-02-01",
                "startTime": "07:00",
                "endTime": "10:00"
            },
            {
                "date": "2024-02-02",
                "startTime": "13:00",
                "endTime": "16:00"
            },
            {
                "date": "2024-02-03",
                "startTime": "16:00",
                "endTime": "19:00"
            }
        ],
        "maxAttendances": 50,
        "language": "English",
        "price": 75.0,
        "extraAmount": 75.0,
        "status": "PENDING",
        "requirements": [
            "Laptop",
            "Notebook"
        ],
        "otherInformation": "This is a sample onsite event.",
        "guestInformation": "Guests are welcome.",
        "hostInformation": "Hosted by John Doe",
        "cancellationPolicy": "Full refund if canceled 7 days before the event.",
        "hostSkillLevel": "BEGINNER",
        "nbrOfDays": 1,
        "hoursPerDay": 7,
        "isDiscountAvailable": true,
        "discount": 10.0,
        "business": [
            "Networking",
            "Professional Development"
        ],
        "experiential": [
            "Hands-on"
        ],
        "healthAndWellness": "Yoga session included",
        "specialInterest": "Technology",
        // "customDates": [
        //     "2023-10-22",
        //     "2023-10-29"
        // ],
        // "isCustomDatesAvailable": true,
        "privateGroupHosting": "NOT_AVAILABLE",
        "privateGroupHostingCharge": 50.0,
        "transferService": "NOT_INCLUDED",
        "latitude": 35.5,
        "longitude": 35.5
    }
}
